name: Infinity Scarf
description: This Infinity Scarf is knitted only in one piece.
languages: Additional languages which are not in the download: Danish
suggested_yarn: ONION Knit No. 4 Organic Wool + Nettles
full_text: This Infinity Scarf is knitted only in one piece. The Infinity Scarf is a quick and beginner friendly scarf to knit on a circular needle. There is not much technique involved. You can knit in one or several colors, and the short repeats are particularly suitable for using several colors of scrap yarns. You will need approximately 60 g of yarn for one scarf. Suggested yarn is Onion No. 4 Organic Wool + nettles 50 g/130 m and a circular needle 4.5 mm 50 cm Opskriften findes på dansk til gratis download fra Kreativitekets hjemmeside
